terms_intro: By using this application, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
terms_1_b: This app is designed to assist users in tracking wound healing and related health data. It is not intended to replace professional medical advice.
terms_2_b: Users are responsible for entering accurate and up-to-date information. The app does not verify or validate the medical data provided.
terms_3_b: The information presented is for monitoring purposes only. Always consult with your healthcare provider before making any medical decisions.
terms_4_b: Your personal health data is stored securely and will not be shared without your consent, in accordance with our privacy policy.
terms_5_b: Users must use the app responsibly and ensure proper wound care is followed as advised by healthcare professionals.
terms_6_b: The app team reserves the right to update or change these terms at any time.
terms_footer: If you do not agree with these terms, please discontinue use of the app.
senior_tip_1_t: Use the App in a Well-Lit Area
senior_tip_1_b: Make sure the room is well-lit to see the screen clearly and avoid eye strain.
senior_tip_2_b: If reading is difficult, go to Settings → Display → Increase Font Size.
senior_tip_3_b: The app is designed to be simple. Don’t rush—each screen has clear buttons and large icons.
senior_tip_4_b: If you prefer listening, you can enable voice guidance to help you through the app.
senior_tip_5_b: Invite a trusted caregiver to help you review reminders and notes when needed.
senior_tip_6_b: Review app notifications each day for reminders or important updates.
senior_tip_7_b: You can always edit or delete entries—take your time and tap carefully.
